ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_FLOAT
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Specify the default float amount to be assigned to the Workstation/Cashier

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_EOW_TIME
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Time when end of week job must be executed
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Time when end of week job must be executed

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_BO_SYSTEM_INACTIVITY
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: BO system auto lock time limit in seconds
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Specify the idle time after which BO must be auto locked (in seconds)

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_CASHIER_CACHE
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Enable or disable caching for cashier
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select if caching is enabled for Cashier

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_SYSTEM_INACTIVITY
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: System auto lock time limit in milliseconds
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Specify the idle time after which registers must be auto locked (in milliseconds)

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_EOW_DAY
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Day when end of week job must be executed
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Day when end of week job must be executed

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_REGISTER_AGGREGATION_REPORT_JOB
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Aggregation report job to be scheduled for register at
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Aggregation report job to be scheduled for register at

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_SYSTEM_LOCK
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Allow to lock the register when a transaction is in progress

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_DECLARE_TYPE
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select the mode for tender declaration

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_CENTRAL_HOUSEKEEPING_JOB
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Housekeeping job to be scheduled for central server at
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Housekeeping job to be scheduled for central server at

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_LOGOFF
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Allow to log off from registers when a transaction is in progress

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_REGISTER_HOUSEKEEPING_JOB
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Housekeeping job to be scheduled for register at
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Housekeeping job to be scheduled for register at

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_DECL_FLOAT
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Include/exclude the float value in the expected total
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Include/exclude the float amount when calculating the expected total during declaration

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_SETTLEMENT_ACCOUNTABILITY_MODE
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Select the accountability mode for the store

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_STORE_HOUSEKEEPING_JOB
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Housekeeping job to be scheduled for store server at
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Housekeeping job to be scheduled for store server at

ConfigurationParameter.name: CONF_NO_DAYS_OLD_TRANSACTION_TO_BE_PICKED_UP
ConfigurationParameter.ShortDescription: Number of days to retain incomplete transactions
ConfigurationParameter.Description: Number of days to retain incomplete transactions
